I keep hearing this on the subject. It would be better if you drove, think of

Nancy in BC

messages.msgSnippet: That would be a bit closer to home at that and I have always wanted to see Alaska, although the Glacier Bay cruises sound so enticing, so I might end up
messages.messageBody:
That would be a bit closer to home at that and I have always wanted to see
Alaska, although the Glacier Bay cruises sound so enticing, so I might end
up skipping the road trip!!

Christina in Seattle area

messages.subject: Alaska Anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: Just got to thinking about this conference in SC, and that is a powerful long way away from Prince George, BC,Canada. I am really low on funds and can t go so
messages.messageBody:
Just got to thinking about this conference in SC, and that is a powerful long
way away from Prince George, BC,Canada. I am really low on funds and can't go
so I think, ( and am sure that Maureen will agree with me) that all of you on
this list should plan an unschooling visit to Alaska this year for your
families, and stop here in Prince George, which happens to be on the way
there !!!!!!!!!
We could use the support and would love to meet everyone we have been reading
about on this list.
I can dream can't I???
Nancy, forever in BC
ps, there is lots to do here for every member of the family, and you could
all camp out in my yard. We offer hot showers.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
